required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiologic Study of Orthodontic Retention Practices in France

brief_summary.textblock: The goal of this study is to survey retention procedures used by French orthodontists, and evaluate the needs for practice guidelines. The hypothesis is that there is no consensus among orthodontists, requiring practice homogenization via expert guidelines. Similar studies have been driven in others European countries (such as Swiss, the Netherlands, Lithuania and Norway), but not in France.

detailed_description.textblock: Questionnaire aggregating 27 questions on orthodontic retention strategies, was sent to a professional list of French orthodontists from health authorities. The survey was composed of eight parts, about sociodemographic status, retention system selection, choice of fixed and removable retention system, retention period, supervision, given instruction and needs for practice guidelines.

primary_outcome.description: Retention system selection, choice of fixed and removable retention system, retention period, supervision, given instruction and needs for practice guidelines.
Retention system selection, choice of fixed and removable retention system, retention period, supervision, given instruction and needs for practice guidelines.

primary_outcome.measure: Description of retention strategies used by clinicians.
primary_outcome.description: Retention system selection, choice of fixed and removable retention system, retention period, supervision, given instruction and needs for practice guidelines.

intervention.description: The survey was composed of eight parts, about sociodemographic status, retention system selection, choice of fixed and removable retention system, retention period, supervision, given instruction and needs for practice guidelines.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All French Specialist orthodontists trained in France who answer the survey
Exclusion Criteria:
- Non-specialist orthodontists, not trained in France
